com.xith3d.render
Interface StateSortable

All Known Subinterfaces:
RenderAtom, Shader
All Known Implementing Classes:
BackgroundColorAtom, BoundsAtom, ColoringShader, FogShader, FragmentProgramShader, LightingShader, LineAttrShader, MaterialShader, PolygonAttrShader, RenderAtomBase, RenderingShader, ShapeAtom, TextureAttrShader, TextureShader, TransformShader, TransparencyShader, VertexProgramShader
public interface StateSortable

The state sortable interface allows for rendering elements to be sorted according to a priority set in the Renderer. This can apply to shaders, atoms, etc.

Copyright (c) 2003 David Yazel Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Version:

David Yazel
